title: Bug 116829: Label height doesn't change with label font modification.
description:
Description: When modifying the font size of a label, the label height does not update immediately.
Steps to reproduce:
1. Create a label on the page.
2. Modify the font size of the label.
3. Observe that the label height does not change accordingly.
OB: When modifying the font size of a label, the label height does not update immediately.
EB: When modifying the font size of a label, the label height should update accordingly.
SR:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Create a label on the page.
2. Modify the font size of the label.
3. Observe that the label height does not change to match the new font size.
